CiviCRM Simple UK Gift Aid Extension


There's several Gift Aid extensions, what does this one do?






It adds a field on every contribution to allow you to select whether it is
   eligible for Gift Aid, and whether Gift Aid has been claimed on it yet.






It provides a Administer Gift Aid tool, launched from a Contributions search,
   that provides a spreadsheet in a format suitable for copy-and-pasting into an
   Inland Revenue claim spreadsheet from those matched contributions. It then
   marks those as claimed.






In doing (2) it tries to use the rules around aggregate small donations to
   enable you to claim Gift Aid on contributions that lack of data (e.g.
   address) would have otherwise prevented you from claiming.






It does NOT:






automatically do anything. It's a tool to assist you in a fiddly task, not a robot.






do online submissions to HMRC.

docs.text:
Installing and Requirements


Requirements


This extension has been written against CiviCRM 4.7 with PHP 5.6 and MariaDB
10.0 (MariaDB is a drop-in replacement for MySQL that I have found to be more
performant than MySQL for CiviCRM, a recent version of MySQL should work just as
well), it requires InnoDB and UTF-8 support.


I have used it in Drupal and Wordpress setups.


Any problems running against other versions please 
submit an
issue
 and ideally
a pull request :-)


Download and install the extension


Download as a ZIP/tgz file (or clone the repo) from


https://github.com/artfulrobot/uk.artfulrobot.civicrm.giftaid/releases


Anwyay, you want to end up with a directory called

uk.artfulrobot.civicrm.giftaid
 within your CiviCRM extensions directory.


Then visit 
CiviCRM » Administer » System Settings » Extensions
 and install it.
